Title: Relates to demolition costs of residential property
Summary: Provides that an owner of a residential building which has been deemed unsafe because of an arson related fire shall be charged the actual cost of demolition.
LawCode: Amd ยง11-301, add ยง11-357, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to demolition costs of residential property
